description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nOscillation:
Your creatures' Spell Gems are 70% more potent when they have an odd number of {STAT_charges}, and are 70% less potent when they have an even number of {STAT_charges}. This trait does not stack.
name: Crystaldune Shard
